title: Chamonix
name: Bellevue
content: In Les Houches you can take the Bellevue cable car (Telepherique de Bellevue) for another view of the Chamonix valley, with Mont Blanc to one side and the Brevent to the other.  A short walk will allow you to see the other side of the mountain towards St. Gervais, Sallanches and the glacier de Bionnassay.  In August 2005, a round-trip pedestrian adult ticket was €12.10. Another option is to take the '''Montblanc Tramway''' from St.Gervais Le Fayet that goes up to Nid d'aigle. It stops at Bellevue on the way. There are beautiful views over the valley from Nid d'Aigle also.
